Course Description

To learn to speak English, it’s necessary that you can hear what native speakers are saying and understand their meaning as well as intention.

This course will help non-native English speakers improve their listening and note-taking skills for the purpose of listening to academic lectures. You will learn techniques for improving your understanding and skills for taking more effective notes, and you will get lots of practice in using these. 

If you’re planning to attend college classes in English, then this class is for you. Register soon to keep your favorite seat at our class.

It is aimed at learners whose native language is not English. This course will help you improve your academic listening and speaking skills. For example, you will learn how to understand and follow a lecture, how to take better lecture notes, how to discuss courses with classmates and professors, and how to give an effective academic presentation.

Be an active listener, you’ll be able to get over any obstacles in learning & communicating with foreigners.
